XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for common Integration Point version 1 elis export plugin

TABLE.NAME: rlipexport_version1elis_fld
TABLE.COMMENT: Custom fields used by version 1 elis export plugin

FIELD.NAME: fieldid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the ELIS custom field

FIELD.NAME: header
FIELD.COMMENT: The header displayed in the export file

FIELD.NAME: fieldorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The order in which fields are displayed
